main event: On July 6, 1957, a local reporting group documented a UFO sighting where an object changed appearance from small to large, observed for three hours.
interesting points: The object was described as yellow with a halo around the top., It made basic circular turns during observation., The sighting was reported as reliable., Initial conclusions suggested the object was probably balloons., There was insufficient data available for further evaluation.
sighted object: a yellow object changing in size
witness description: The subject stated he had sighted three or more objects but reported this as the first one.
